HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: By request most of the patches made by the Filthy Orc Invasion temporary fix mod made by Tarojun have now been included with the mod. This will hopefully make the orcs more like what it seemed the original author intended.

Due to a bad interaction with the developer of the HAR framework combined with the increased work required I have decided to not further update this mod. It will stay up to support the previous versions of the game.
